Skip to main content Loading North Charleston North Charleston Open at 11:00 AM | Delivery | Patio Mellow Mushroom has the best pizza in North Charleston, South Carolina. Our restaurant is located on Tanger Outlet Boulevard. Mellow is a favorite for travelers and locals in Downtown Charleston, West Ashley, and the surrounding areas. Mellow delivers the best pizza experience in town with our delicious dough, premium ingredients, and unique flavors. Delivering A Higher Order of Pizza™ is our standard. If we can make pizza this tasty and delicious, just imagine what we can do with Munchies, Greens, calzones, and burgers. Many of our pizzas can be made gluten-free or vegan. Take your pick from our selection of 40 draft beers and our tasty, handcrafted cocktails. Looking to feed a group? Mellow has carefully curated catering options to make sure everyone goes home with their cravings satisfied.
